name: sambal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hot sauce made from chopped vegetables or fruit, and spices, originally from Southeast Asia: Sambal is a kind of spicy chili chutney. Tamarind is a very acidic fruit which gives sambals a particularly sharp taste.
Eni Dwi Astuti/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesA sambal is a chilli-hot relish found in the cooking of Sri Lanka, Singapore, Indonesia, and Malaysia.This is a very simple sambal, quick and easy to make. Young tapioca leaves can be boiled and eaten with sambal.
